entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Intellisense is showing compiler generated fields in a C# project #68240
    17.7
  • Visual Studio no longer displays warning for inappropriate namespace #68239
  • Code clean-up removes "this" on methods despite being configured otherwise #68238
  • Weird Syntax Highlighting and Error locations with non-deterministic c# source generator #68237
  • VS 2022 constantly complains about inconsistent line ends #68236
  • Renaming variable typed `nint`/`nuint` fails when multitargeting #68234
  • MemberNames can observably change after GetMembers is called #68233
  • Run source generator steps that do not use syntax trees before other steps #68225
  • Recursive type triggers Roslyn stack overflow and crashes Visual Studio #68223

Closed

  • IDE0052 False Positive when operator ??= is used #59675
    Backlog
  • Add an analyzer to warn about redundant null forgiving operators #68204

PullRequests

Created

  • Change loc branch #68231
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Change 17.6-vs-deps to 17.6 in PublishData.json #68229
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.6-vs-deps to release/dev17.6 #68228
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Rationalize how temporary directory works today #68226
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Relax parameter-argument modifier matching #68224
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, C# 12.0
  • Disallow inline array operations in expression trees. #68222
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays

Merged

  • Sync C# required members implementation with VB changes #68200
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members, Next
  • Remove InterceptableAttribute #68213
    Area-Compilers
  • Use in-proc for PreviewWorkspace from Tools|Options #68232
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Change EnC contract namespace #68230
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Add missing nuget versions #68235
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Merge main to features/CollectionLiterals #68227
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implement member lookup for extension types #68137
    Area-Compilers, C# 12.0
  • Ensure proper handling of generic SynthesizedGlobalMethodSymbol. #68211
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Validate InlineArrayAttribute applications on types in source. #68195
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Use net8.0 runtime for InlineArray tests #68190
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Handle null compilation options in IsCandidateForFullSolutionAnalysis #68206
    Area-IDE, Tenet-Reliability, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Remove all fields from SourceOrdinaryMethodSymbol in the common case. #68135
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Allow parsing `ref readonly` modifier #68164
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, C# 12.0
  • Enabled .NET remote host by default #68161
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add support for ref returning methods and properties in `With` statement. #68203
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Locals and Returns, untriaged
  • Add design for interceptors with nonzero arity #68218
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Initial support for dictionary collection literals #68197
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reuse member names collection in decl tree across edits #67753
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Bot rules for stale issues and PRs #67684
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add and emit ref kind for ref readonly parameters #68179
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, C# 12.0
  • Lazily calculate preview operations #68214
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Move LongPath check to MSBuild target #68217
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
